ing: 1 (7 ounce) can lobster meat, drained and flaked
des: "Always a big hit.  Make in a day in advance and take out when needed.  Will go quickly!"
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together lobster meat, onion, lemon juice, cream cheese, butter and prepared horseradish. Continue mixing until smooth. Cover and chill in the refrigerator until serving.
